div.a: Rolling In It: Plush Cars Of...

img.alt: Members of the Boston Celtics dance team perform in Game Five of the Eastern Conference Semifinals against the Philadelphia 76ers during the 2012 NBA Playoffs on May 21, 2012 at the TD Garden in Boston, Massachusetts. (Photo by Jesse D. Garrabrant/NBAE via Getty Images)
img.title: Celtics Dancers 2012

img.alt: The Reebok CrossFit Competition was in town Friday.
img.title: Reebok Crossfit Competition

img.alt: With the new CBS reality series ‘Dogs In The City’ premiering on Wednesday, May 30 (8-9 p.m. ET/PT), we asked members of the WBZ-TV news team to share pictures of their top dogs. Say hello to Rosie, David Wade’s beloved Cocker Spaniel.
img.title: The WBZ-TV Family & Their Dogs

img.alt: Jon O'Hara claims he was the infamous "paper bag man" at Fenway Park May 10, 2012. (Photo courtesy: Jon O'Hara-Twitter)
img.title: paper bag man

img.alt: Linebacker Junior Seau. (Photo by Elsa/Getty Images)
img.title: Junior-Seau

img.alt: NEW YORK, NY - APRIL 26: Dont'a Hightower of Alabama holds up a jersey as he stands on stage with NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell after he was selected #25 overall by the New England Patriots in the first round of the 2012 NFL Draft at Radio City Music Hall on April 26, 2012 in New York City. (Photo by Al Bello/Getty Images)
img.title: Dont'a Hightower

img.alt: Actress Gwyneth Paltrow (left) and her mother actress Blythe Danner pose at the 2004 Crystal & Lucy Awards - "A Family Affair: Women in Film Celebrates The Paltrow Family" at the Century Plaza Hotel on June 18, 2004 in Los Angeles. (Photo by Kevin Winter/Getty Images)
img.title: Gwyneth Paltrow And Blythe Danner

img.alt: The Boston Celtics dancers perform in Game Three of the Eastern Conference Quarterfinals against the Atlanta Hawks during the 2012 NBA Playoffs on May 4, 2012 at TD Garden in Boston, Massachusetts. (Photo by Brian Babineau/NBAE via Getty Images)
img.title: Celtics Dancers 2012

img.alt: With the new CBS reality series ‘Dogs In The City’ premiering on Wednesday, May 30 (8-9 p.m. ET/PT), we asked members of the WBZ-TV news team to share pictures of their top dogs. Say hello to Panama, Bree Sison’s beloved Chihuahua.
img.title: The WBZ-TV Family & Their Dogs
